name: unawakened
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not yet having started to understand or feel something: His unawakened soul knows nothing of the anxieties of the spiritual mind. This all happened during a period when my mind was serene and unawakened to the tragic mysteries of life. Related word
awaken
More examplesFewer examplesThe book divides humanity into two parts: the unawakened majority, and the privileged few who are in the know.They have a pillow-fight in which the flying feathers symbolize their unawakened sensuality.The Nutcracker is a profound suburban fantasy of unawakened femininity: how to be dainty, slender, and elegant.
